custom-title-logo.name: Custom Title Logo
custom-title-logo.description: Custom title logo text. Leave empty for Geometry Dash (real).

every-word-dash-integration.name: Every Word Dash Integration
every-word-dash-integration.description: Enable integration with the <cg>Every Word Dash API</cg>. Will send an API request on every game boot.

force-uppercase.name: Force Uppercase
force-uppercase.description:
Forces the font to be <cj>uppercase</cj>, if disabled you still can use both lower and upper cases.
<cy>Note that Every Word Dash titles are always uppercase.</cy>

aggressive-prefetch.name: Aggressive Prefetch (Read Info!)
aggressive-prefetch.description:
More aggressively fetches the word from the Every Word Dash API <cy>on game boot</cy>. This will help make the title logo be more up-to-date on game boot, <cr>at the expense of the game taking longer to start.</cr>
Don't worry, the game won't explode if the API is down.
aggressive-prefetch.enable-if-description: Enable the EWD integration to use this setting.

issues.info: Please report any problems or suggestions you have to this mod's GitHub repository by making an issue!
